|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML04G100TFI00; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125 IT:K; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Wistron NeWeb DNXB-M2I |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43460;BCM43460IMLG, TE1407 P20, 356796 3 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== There are multiple AP 7532 sold for various regions: *60740 models seem to be external antenna models *67030 models seem to use internal antennae only
OUI: 84:24:8D (''Zebra Technologies'') FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UZ7 UZ7]
*"[G]48DNXBOF.OGB" and "2014.02.06" is silkscreened on :the blue 2.4GHz wireless module ''Wistron NeWeb DNXB-M2I'' *"[G]48DNXBOI.SGB" and "2014.03.06" is silkscreened on :the green 5GHz wireless module ''Wistron NeWeb DNXB-M5I'' *"[G]48RNAW04.SGC" and "2014.04.24" is silkscreened on :the main board AP 7532 (''WNC'' P/N: 4L-RAABM13-016) *AP-7532I-US marked by ''Symbol Technologies''
[[Category:English Documentation]]
